column1: English Sent: According to this theory
column2: the crust (upper part) of the earth has been formed out of seven major and some minor plates.; (Figure 2SYMBOL-DOT2)

column1: Hindi Tansl: isa sixXAMwa ke anusAra
column2: pqWvI kI UparI parpatI sAwa badZI evaM kuCa CotI pletoM se banI hE (ciwra 2.2).

column1: Anu Translation:  sAwa muKya viRaya Ora kuCa Wode pleta ke bAhara banAyA gayA hE isa sixXAnwa ke anusAra pqWvI kI UparI parawa (ucca BAga (afka 2.2
